short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sip is a Chrome extension that helps you master startup lingos, one word at a time. Learn the definition of common startup terms,…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sip is a Chrome extension that helps you master startup lingos, one word at a time. Learn the definition of common startup terms, along with case studies, as you open a new tab.

Tired of looking up “Top 100 startup terms every entrepreneur should know” before every investor meeting, or overwhelmed when talking to your founder friends? With Sip, gradually build up your glossary every time you open a new tab. One “sip” at a time.

Every term card comes with a randomly populated word, its definition in layman’s terms, and a small case study/example to demonstrate.
